Class AudioPlayerExample1

java.lang.Object
  AudioPlayerExample1
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.sound.sampled.LineListener
public class AudioPlayerExample1
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.sound.sampled.LineListener

This is an example program that demonstrates how to play back an audio file using the Clip in Java Sound API.

Author:
www.codejava.net
